timeline.message:
Remove use of J9VM_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER

Instead use OMR_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER. This closes the possiblity that
the omr and j9 flags are set to different values.

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't this need to be set ON?
timeline.author: pshipton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,13 +29,11 @@ set(J9VM_ENV_SHARED_LIBS_CALLEE_GLOBAL_TABLE_SETUP ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_ENV_SHARED_LIBS_USE_GLOBAL_TABLE ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_ENV_USE_GCC ON CACHE BOOL "")
 
-set(OMR_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER OFF CACHE BOOL "")

timeline.message:
Remove use of J9VM_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER

Instead use OMR_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER. This closes the possiblity that
the omr and j9 flags are set to different values.

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>

Remove use of J9VM_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER

Instead use OMR_GC_IDLE_HEAP_MANAGER. This closes the possiblity that
the omr and j9 flags are set to different values.

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>
